headline: Why Roku wants you to buy a Roku TV
description:
There has to be a way to block Automatic Content Recognition (ACR). While I don't have a Roku any longer, I do have a Firestick, which I'm sure gathers similar data. The more we learn, the more we learn we're being tracked. I know FreeTube allows you to proxy your connection to prevent YouTube from seeing who you are (I don't trust this 100%). Any thoughts on defeating ACR other than the increasingly-rare non-smart TV. Maybe a computer and large TV not internet enabled.

https://www.nasdaq.com/articles/1-big-reason-why-roku-wants-you-to-buy-a-roku-tv
headline_zh-Hans: 为什么Roku希望你买一台Roku电视？
headline_zh-Hant: 為什麼Roku希望你買一臺Roku電視？
description_zh-Hans:
一定有办法可以阻止自动内容识别（ACR）。虽然我不再有Roku，但我有Firestick，我相信它也收集了类似的数据。我们了解得越多，就越能知道我们被追踪了。我知道FreeTube允许你代理你的连接，以防止YouTube看到你是谁（我不是100%相信这个）。除了越来越少的非智能电视之外，还有什么想法可以打败ACR。也许一台电脑和不支持互联网的大电视。

https://www.nasdaq.com/articles/1-big-reason-why-roku-wants-you-to-buy-a-roku-tv
description_zh-Hant:
